author: mpetrunic
content: <@!340345049063882753> You could add flag "minPeers" so you can tell your node to reject duties until it reaches requested amount of peers. But even without that, if you don't have peers, you can return duty, if validator proposes, you will process them but you won't propagate then (as you don't have peers anyways), once you obtains peer and discoveres that you are million blocks behind, just discard your chain and start syncing from genesis I guess (if your newly discovered peers have finalized epochs)
